author: Minyvonne Burke and Associated Press
title: 3 California churches sue Gov. Gavin Newsom over coronavirus orders
description: Three southern California churches have filed a lawsuit against the governor and local officials over orders that ban religious gatherings because of the coronavirus pandemic.
content:
Three southern California churches have filed a lawsuit against the state's governor and local officials over orders that ban religious gatherings because of the coronavirus pandemic.
Gov. Gavin Newsom issued a stay-at-home order on March 19 to help slow the… [+3400 chars]
